Hello David,

On Mon, Oct 20, 2008 at 11:25 AM, David Saff <david@...> wrote:
> What runner are you using to run the tests? Eclipse? Ant?

I'm using Ant. I've tried with haltonfailure and haltonerror, but they
don't work for me.
I think that it is because the ant task I'm using has only one test:
the suite. But I'm not sure; I don't have experience with this stuff.

> David Saff

thanks.
